result.purpose: Defines data models for handling routes and tokens in a blockchain context.
result.architecture: The folder follows a modular architecture pattern, focusing on data models that support the functionality of a decentralized exchange.

internal/domains/dex/models/route.go.purpose: Defines data models for handling routes and token transactions in a blockchain context.

internal/domains/dex/models/tokens.go.purpose: Defines data models for listing tokens with pagination support.
